Articles.Content:
KSP 2
My sepcs : W10 Pro 22H2
Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO V1.0 BIOS F15C
AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 6-Core 3.80 Ghz AM4
Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 Super
16 Go Ram
Display : Asus VG32V

Deploying a satellite around Mun, go back to vab to build another ship, saving game then exit game.

loading the last save game : freeze on "loading vessel", if waitting a long time : black screen

loading the last but one save game  : ok, but game centered on the satellite, very fast rotating vessel then dismantled , I meet the Kraken.

Create a new campain, empty, and just save.

copying last build vessel from the folder of the previous campain to the folder of the new one

Can open the last save new campain, so the last vessel was not the case of corrupted save game
